meanings.sent1: The puppy gave an adoring look to its owner.
meanings.sent2: She received an adoring smile from her fans.
meanings.sent3: The adoring cat followed its owner around the house, always wanting attention.
meanings.sent4: The adoring gaze of the child towards the teacher melted everyone's hearts.
meanings.sent5: The adoring crowd cheered loudly for their favorite singer.

meanings.definition: To regard with deep, often rapturous love
meanings.sent1: He adoringly watched his partner perform on stage.
meanings.sent2: She adored her grandmother, always listening to her stories with fascination.
meanings.sent3: The little girl adoringly hugged her teddy bear, never letting it go.
meanings.sent4: The artist adored the sunset, finding inspiration in its beauty.
meanings.sent5: The couple adoringly held hands, lost in their own world of love.
